cakes.name: Sid`s Ice Cream Cookie-Cake
cakes.description: Seriously. It’s like a cloud of Devil’s Food Cake rained down Cookies into a sea of ice cream. Okay, it’s not exactly like that, but it’s close.Serves 12.
